email_subject: Re: trading the dots time again?
email_body: does the arnolds' worldwide notoriety surprise you? John Buckner Thomas 08/21/2000 12:20 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Matthew Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT Subject: Re: trading the dots time again? season started saturday. ends in may. i'm pretty open..... bring it. arsenal v liverpool tonite. me and hugh grant are neighbors (notting hill)... and he's been asking about the arnolds... or something. John Arnold 21/08/2000 18:16 To: John Buckner Thomas/LON/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: trading the dots time again? when are we invited?? John Buckner Thomas 08/21/2000 11:51 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: trading the dots time again? when are you and your brother coming over to watch some premier league?
